title: Welcome to Thinkr
subtitle: Website Version 1.0
para: The launch of our website is the first step in delivering Web3 products that will make a positive impact on students and higher education. The road ahead is an exciting one and all we will do during this journey will be our greatest reward.

title: Community Building
subtitle: We are all going to make it. #WAGMI
para: Bringing together a group of individuals that know the importance of opportunity in education. We believe education is a human right. Let’s make that a reality.

title: Announcing the Lovelace Scholarship Program
subtitle: Letting the World Know
para: The Lovelace Scholarship Program is one of the many ways we plan on using Web3 technology to revolutionize the relationship students have with higher education. We plan on getting the word out there about what we’re building and how it will impact lives in a tangible way.

title: Recruit more Thinkrs!
subtitle: We need more Thinkrs like you!
para: Thinkr is in the early community and structural development stages. As our project grows, we will continue looking for talented, diverse, and open-minded members that bring value to our team.

title: Smart Contract Planning
subtitle: Structural Planning in Progress
para: Architecting Thinkr’s NFT Smart contract and minting contract.
